name: NEKROTRONIC VR
description:
Nekrotronic VR is an intensely immersive sci-fi shoot ‘em up. Featuring insane action and creepy ghosts from the feature film Nekrotronic, this VRexperience will get your heart pumping and your hair standing on end. In this hyper-realistic first person shooter, players experience what it’s like to be a Nekromancer: hunt Ghost-Wraiths, dodge their stealth attacks from the shadows, operate sci-fi technology, 3D print demons and destroy them all with big, bad plasma rifles.

Smash, bash and blast your demon enemies back to HELL!
